articles.description: All the latest transfer news and reaction to Jack Grealish's loan move from Manchester City to Everton.
articles.title: Transfer news: Jack Grealish joins Everton, latest on Eze, Isak, Guehi

articles.description: BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah: Egyptian king - where it all began for Liverpool star

articles.description: BBC Sport TV and radio commentators pick the players they think could be the breakout stars of the new Premier League season, and a manager too.
articles.title: Premier League: 'Little Messi', 'The Spider' and 'The Little Engine' - 21 wildcard players to watch

articles.description: Nine-time Grand Slam champion Monica Seles reveals she was diagnosed with myasthenia gravis - a neuromuscular autoimmune disease - three years ago.
articles.title: Monica Seles: Nine-time Grand Slam champion reveals myasthenia gravis diagnosis

articles.description: One month after the end of the best season in their history, Paris St-Germain kick off the new one with the chance to win yet another trophy, against Tottenham.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain look to add fifth trophy in Uefa Super Cup against Tottenham

articles.description: American sprinter Sha'Carri Richardson says she will seek help following her arrest over allegations of domestic violence.
articles.title: Sha'Carri Richardson to seek help following airport arrest

articles.description: Bournemouth complete the signing of French centre-back Bafode Diakite from Lille for about £34m.
articles.title: Bafode Diakite: Bournemouth complete £34m signing from Lille

articles.description: BBC senior football correspondent Sami Mokbel looks at how Tottenham are shaping up for the season under new manager Thomas Frank.
articles.title: Tottenham: Thomas Frank brings 'glass half-full' philosophy to Spurs before new season

articles.description: Newcastle are in advanced negotiations with Aston Villa over a move for midfielder Jacob Ramsey.
articles.title: Jacob Ramsey transfer: Newcastle in advanced talks with Aston Villa over midfielder

articles.description: Welsh Rugby Union (WRU) chief executive Abi Tierney will temporarily step away from her role after being diagnosed with cancer.
articles.title: WRU chief Abi Tierney to step away from role after cancer diagnosis
